## Chip Information

### Basic Info
- **Manufacturer**: [e.g., Samsung, Micron, Hynix]
- **Model**: [e.g., K9F4G08U0D]
- **Part Number**: [Full part number from datasheet]

### Chip ID
If you can read the chip ID, provide it here:
```
ID Bytes: [e.g., EC DC 10 95 54]
```

### Specifications
- **Capacity**: [e.g., 512MB, 1GB, 4GB]
- **Page Size**: [e.g., 2048 bytes]
- **OOB/Spare Size**: [e.g., 64 bytes]
- **Block Size**: [e.g., 64 pages]
- **Bus Width**: [8-bit / 16-bit]

### Timing (if known)
- **tRC (Read Cycle)**: [e.g., 25ns]
- **tWC (Write Cycle)**: [e.g., 25ns]
